channel.title: Linux not recognizing java?
channel.description: Does anyone know how to get Java recognized on CentOS (Linux)? I got everything working and i'm using Wine to boot the server from the batch file and everything runs fine, but I keep getting the error not recognized as a command. I already followed several tuts on the whole "export JAVA_HOME="---"" thing but nothing seems to work. Is there anyone that could spare 5-10 minutes and help me out? My skype is Connor.s68 if you can't reach me here on mopar. Really needing some help! :(

item.title: Linux not recognizing java?
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

You shouldn’t be using Linux if you’re using wine to run batch files.

Read full topic
